A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I see why Mark Hamill protested against what they did with Luke Skywalker. Kylie Ren was the only believable or enjoyable character in this said mess. This is the end of Star Wars at least as far as the Skywalker saga is concerned. It deserved much better.Hopefully people will begin to wake up to the fact that a giant monopoly like Disney will only continue to water down any franchise it gets its grubby white mitts on.
